title: Acrylic WiFi Professional 3.0.5770.30583 + Crack {B4tman}
description:
Acrylic WiFi Professional 3.0.5770.30583 + Crack {B4tman}
 
http://s2.postimg.org/wwbkxoaux/image.jpg 
http://s2.postimg.org/tdzl1a9yw/image.jpg

Description:-

Acrylic WiFi Professional is the best WiFi analyzer software to identify access points and wifi channels, and to analyze and resolve incidences on 802.11a/b/g/n/ac wireless networks in real time.

It is a perfect tool for advanced users and professional WiFi network analysts and administrators to control their office wireless network performance and who is connected to it, identify access point data transmission speeds, and optimize their companys WiFi network channels.

Access WiFi network detailed information, including hidden wireless networks, and make the most of unique features such as monitor mode to capture and analyze all wireless device traffic, device viewer, equipment inventory, and WiFi speed analysis.

Features:-

Hardware:-

Basic data capture with WLAN API and advanced monitor mode capture with NDIS compatible devices and airpcap hardware.

Incidence Resolution:-

All the information you need to detect performance issues and improve WiFi network distribution in your home or at your office.

Monitoring:-

Network and client traffic, signal strength, WiFi channels and WiFi device activity monitoring in real time.

Requirements:-

Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista
Language: English
Architecture: Compatible with x86 and x64 systems.
Libraries: Microsoft NET 4.5 or later version 
Drivers: For traffic capture is necessary to have the WiFi cards drivers updated which Acrylic WiFi will interact on, both Airpcap devices as WiFi USB cards compatible with NDIS.
Dependencies: It is necessary that the Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2012 packet. The absence of this dependence can cause installation errors as the absence of msvcr110.dll library
